Santa_Clara.San Jose High School:
San José High School (SJHS) is a public high school in San Jose, California.
Founded in 1863 as California's second oldest public high school, San José High alumni have held prominent positions in San Josean, Californian, and American society.


== History ==

During the Winter of 1863-1864, the owner of Orbon's Flour Store sold his store somewhere and the high school was moved to a one-room structure on Washington Square that was built in 1857.
